entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Clarenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:40 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 05:30 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023
Temperature: -15.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -17.3°C
Wind: WNW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny except cloudy along parts of the coast this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast early this morning. Wind becoming west 20 this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023
